answers.answer: Dont read to much  on the internet. The net tends to scare people more then anything. Im sure you will  be fine nd c section is the safest way for you if it still remains low however you do have time for it to move abit. Im sure your dr i aware of the situation  and will  do everything in his power to control the bleeding if have too. All the best hun

question: 3w weeks and still have low lying placenta I'm so afraid that I'm going to hemorrhage during my c section I've been looking it up on Google and apparently because I've had previous c sections I've a 7 percent chance of dying from hemorrhaging even with intervention from the best doc. This will be my 6th section. I wasn't told any of this by doc when I was thinking of having another child anyone go through any of this before. I also have gestational diabetes which is new to me too
title: So afraid low lying placenta
